attributes.action: Abandon the plans for a 50p per month levy on fixed phone lines to pay for high speed broadband on lines which are unable to receive it at the present.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In line with many hundreds of thousands of other people,I can only get 1.5 meg as a maximum on my BT line due to the poor state of the line. Why should we have to pay a "tax" to pay for other people to get a faster service than ours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
